long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can create bookmarks in a Youtube video. It helps you to watch your bookmarked moments of the video next time easily. 

You can name the bookmarks meaningfully, so you can find your wanted bookmark next time easily. The bookmarks can be deleted if you don't need them. 

In the Options page, you could have an overview of all the bookmarks you made for all the video. And you can edit, play or delete them there easily.

=== new in version 1.1.0

It now shows a toast message once you add a bookmark, so that you are more than sure that you have successfully created a bookmark.
